definition: The Injustice to Dou E (popular drama by 關漢卿|关汉卿[Guan1 Han4 qing1])

sentences.english: Snow in the summer is a famous Zajufrom the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《竇娥冤》是一部著名的元雜劇。

sentences.english: In "Dou E's Case of Injustice", Dou Tianzhang's appearance is not as much as the main character.
sentences.chinese: 在《竇娥冤》劇中，竇天章的出場次數並不算多。

sentences.english: Dou E Yuan is the model of seeking theatrical equity.
sentences.chinese: 《竇娥冤》是追求劇場均衡性的典範。

definition: Guan Hanqing (c. 1235-c. 1300), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家
to comment/a point by point commentary
Wang Shifu (fl. 1295-1307), author of Romance of the West Chamber 西廂記|西厢记
a genre of poetry, developed in the Tang Dynasty, characterized by its strict form
a Yuan dynasty form of musical comedy
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
Tang Xianzu (1550-1616), Ming poet and dramatist, author of The Peony Pavilion 牡丹亭[Mu3 dan5 Ting2]
Feng Menglong (1574-1646), late Ming dynasty novelist writing in colloquial (baihua), author of Stories Old and New 古今小說|古今小说[Gu3 jin1 Xiao3 shuo1]
